CustomField.formula: IF( OR( ISBLANK(Bank_Contract_No_Spot_Rate__c) , ISPICKVAL(Bank_Spot_Rate__c, "") , ISPICKVAL(Currency_Code_Spot_Rate__c, "") , ISBLANK(Transaction_Date_Spot_Rate__c) ,ISNULL(Spot_Rate__c), (Spot_Rate__c = 0) , ISNULL(Total_Spot_Contract_Amount__c), (Total_Spot_Contract_Amount__c = 0) ), false, true)
CustomField.label: Spot Contract Populated
